0100000001010100 0100101101100010 0 -> sum: 1000101110110110, cout: 0

0010000000000001 0010010011010100 0 -> sum: 0100010011010101, cout: 0
0111101011100111 0111011110011011 0 -> sum: 1111001010000010, cout: 0
0000101010010111 1111100100101000 1 -> sum: 0000001111000000, cout: 1

0111111111111111 1000000000000001 1 -> sum: 0000000000000001, cout: 1
